title: Case Details
contactTribunalAboutTheCase: Contact the tribunal about my case
findLegalAdvice: Find legal advice (opens in new tab)
personalDetails: View and edit your personal details
contactTribunal: Contact the tribunal about your case
submittedAlert: You have submitted your claim to the tribunal
processClaim: We aim to process your claim by
busyPeriod: . In busy periods it may take longer.

viewResponse.header: The tribunal has acknowledged a claim against
viewResponse.p1: You have responded to this claim

acknowledgement.header: The tribunal has acknowledged a claim against
acknowledgement.link: View the claimant's ET1 claim form
acknowledgement.p1: You should respond to this claim by
acknowledgement.p2:
What happens next
The tribunal has asked the respondent to respond to your claim by

rejection.header: The tribunal has rejected all or part of your claim
rejection.p1: The tribunal will close your claim.

tseHasSubmit.p2TypeB: You do not need to respond to this application.
tseHasSubmit.p3a: If you have any objections or responses to their application you must send them to the tribunal as soon as possible and by

respondentRepresented.title: You are now being legally represented by
respondentRepresented.p1: You will be kept updated with case communication but will no longer be able to
respondentRepresented.l2: Directly respond to applications or notifications

respondentNotRepresented.p1: You are no longer legally represented.
respondentNotRepresented.p2: You may continue to represent yourself or you may wish to appoint a new legal representative.

storedPending.header: You have stored correspondence which you have not submitted to the tribunal
storedPending.line1: You must send a copy of this correspondence and all supporting documents to the other party before you submit it to the tribunal.
storedPending.line2: If the other party does respond to your application, they are expected to copy their response to you.

notification.responseRequired: The tribunal requires some information from you.
notification.noResponseRequired: The tribunal has sent you a notification

multiples.groupClaim: Your claim is part of a group claim
multiples.designated: Your individual case is designated the lead case in a group claim. You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
multiples.stayed: Your individual claim is stayed. The group claim will progress. You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
multiples.nonLead: You will be notified of the progress of the group claim.
